about_the_game:
If the game has aroused interest, ADD IT TO YOUR WISH LIST

52 / 0 = ∞. What does it mean? I do not promise that after completing this game you will understand this name

In 2040, humanity invented an ultra-fast quantum computer that could perform almost any operation in zero seconds. The main character simulates the development of humanity on this computer, trying to figure out how to create an ideal society. For 10 years he tried to find the perfect society, but all attempts were in vain. But one day, running a simulation, he was able to…

"52/0 = ∞” is a story told in animated illustrations, with a choice. The game takes place in the USA, in the year 2054. The main character is the head of a corporation that owns an ultrafast quantum computer.

The hero has a family. His family has a five-year-old son. The main character will have to face a difficult choice. Perhaps happiness awaits him somewhere, and somewhere else death

✔ An exciting story awaits you

✔ Stylish graphics made of text characters

✔ Atmospheric soundtrack

✔ Unexpected plot twists

✔ Disturbing, oppressive atmosphere

✔ Secrets and riddles

If the game has aroused interest, ADD IT TO YOUR WISH LIST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560X
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This is a story with illustrations. You have to choose your destiny. You are obsessed with the idea of creating an ideal society. One day you come up with a genius idea, and you create a society that could live forever, BUT HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE!!?
